meanings.definition: A secondary or subordinate idea within a larger concept.
meanings.sent1: In the essay, the author introduced a subidea to further explain the main point.
meanings.sent2: The subidea about teamwork was crucial to the success of the project.
meanings.sent3: The subidea about using emojis in formal emails made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her subidea was like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered within the text.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful visuals to make the subidea more engaging for the students.

meanings.definition: A smaller idea that supports a main argument or thesis.
meanings.sent1: The subidea provided strong evidence to back up the main claim.
meanings.sent2: Including a subidea in your presentation can make your argument more convincing.
meanings.sent3: The subidea that chocolate can improve focus was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: His subidea acted as a sturdy pillar holding up the entire theory.
meanings.sent5: The subidea shone brightly, illuminating the path to understanding the thesis.
